source_sentence: 大唐貞元續開元釋教錄卷下(入藏錄)甲戌歲西明寺翻經臨壇沙門圓照集上四朝應制所翻經論。
translation: The Great Tang Zhenyuan Continued Kaiyuan Translation of the Record of the Buddhist Canon, Volume II (Record of Entering the Canon), in the year Jixu, Ximing Temple, translated the scriptures, Lin Tan Shaman Yuanzhao gathered the scriptures and treatises that were translated during the last four dynasties in response to the regulations.

source_sentence: 及念誦法。
translation: He also recited the Dharma.

source_sentence: 并修疏記碑表錄集等。
translation: And the cultivation of commentaries, memorials, tablet records, collections, and so forth.

source_sentence: 總三百四十五卷(分成三十帙)。
translation: It's a total of 345 volumes (divided into 30 books).

source_sentence: 一百九十三卷經論及念誦法
translation: One hundred and ninety-three volumes of sūtras, treatises, and recitation methods.

source_sentence: 六十四卷經律疏義
translation: Commentary on the Sixty-four Fascicle Sutra and the Vinaya

source_sentence: 八十八卷貞元新集古今制詔碑表記錄一百九十三卷經論及念誦法玄宗朝金剛智三藏洎代宗朝。
translation: Eighty-eight Fascicle Zhenyuanxinji gujin muzhao bei table record One Hundred and Ninety-three Fascicle Sutra Treatise and Niansong fa Genzong dynasty Jingangzhi sanzang cook Daizong dynasty.

source_sentence: 贈開府儀同三司。
translation: He was presented with the title of assistant to the director of the court.

source_sentence: 諡大弘教三藏和尚。
translation: He was appointed the monk of the great Hongjiao tripiṭaka.

source_sentence: 上所翻譯經已入目者。
translation: The sūtras translated above have been entered into the catalogue.

source_sentence: 總一部四卷(不入今計中)。
translation: It is a four-fascicle work in total (not included in the present calculation).

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽中略出念誦法四卷(亦云經)　八十一紙右已編入開元釋教錄。
translation: The four fascicles of the recitation method outlined in the Vajraśekhara Yoga (also called the sūtra) on 81 pages and the right side have been catalogued in the Kaiyuan Record of the Teaching of the Buddhas.

source_sentence: 不入今計數中。
translation: It's not included in the present count.

source_sentence: 玄宗朝所翻經遺漏。
translation: The sutra that was translated in the Xuanzong dynasty was left out.

source_sentence: 未及入古今錄者。
translation: It's not yet included in the records of the past and present.

source_sentence: 總五部(六卷)。
translation: There are five general collections (six volumes).

source_sentence: 金剛恐怖集會方廣儀軌觀自在菩薩三世最勝心明王經一卷(在不空三藏所譯經第一帙收)　二十二紙大威力烏摳瑟摩明王經二卷(或三卷)　三十五紙穢跡金剛說神通大滿陀羅尼法術靈要門一卷　五紙穢跡金剛法禁百變法一卷　三紙右件三部共四卷。
translation: Jingang fang jiehui fangguang yigui guan zizai pusa sangshi zuishangxin mingwang jing 1 roll (included in the first book of sūtras translated by the Bukong Tripiṭaka) 22 pages Daweili wuqinseimo mingwang jing 2 rolls (or 3 rolls) 35 pages Foul-marked vajra shuo shenzong dabuan tuoluoni fashi ling yao men 1 roll 5 pages Foul-marked vajra fa ban baijian fa 1 roll 3 pages Right three parts of a total of four rolls.

source_sentence: 並北天竺國三藏沙門阿質達霰(唐言無能勝將)翻譯。
translation: It was translated by the Tripiṭaka monk Ajitaśaila (Tang term for invincible general) from northern India.

source_sentence: 普遍智藏般若波羅蜜多心經一卷　二紙右東天竺國三藏沙門法月翻譯(梵云達摩戰涅羅)。
translation: One volume of the Prajñāpāramitā Heart Sutra of the Universal Treasury of Wisdom, two pages right, translated by Dharmacandra, the Sanzang master of the Eastern India country, Fayue (Sanskrit: Dharmacandra).

source_sentence: 金剛頂經瑜伽修習毘盧遮那三麼地法一卷　十五紙千手千眼觀世音菩薩大身呪本一卷　二紙千手千眼觀自在菩薩廣大圓滿無礙大悲心陀羅尼呪本一卷　三紙不動使者陀羅尼祕密法一卷　十一紙右件四部共四卷。
translation: 金剛頂經瑜伽修習毘盧遮那三麼地法一卷　十五紙千手千眼觀世音菩薩大身呪本一卷　二紙千手千眼觀自在菩薩廣大圓滿無礙大悲心陀羅尼呪本一卷　三紙不動使者陀羅尼祕密法一卷　十一紙右件四部共四卷。

source_sentence: 南天竺國三藏沙門金剛智(跋析羅菩提)翻譯。
translation: Translated by the tripiṭaka monk Vajrajña (Bhadrapāla Bodhi) of southern India.

source_sentence: 右已上八部共九卷。
translation: The eight collections on the right and on the left total nine fascicles.

source_sentence: 同為一帙(或十卷)。
translation: They are all in one volume (or ten volumes).

source_sentence: 右上八部十卷。
translation: The eight collections on the right are ten volumes long.

source_sentence: 並開元錄中遺漏。
translation: They were omitted from the Kaiyuan Catalogue.

source_sentence: 未編入古今錄中故此收爾。
translation: It was not included in the Record of Ancient and Modern [Teachings], so it was included here.

source_sentence: 代宗朝大曆七年。
translation: It was the seventh year of the Dali era of the Daizong dynasty.

source_sentence: 特進試鴻臚卿大興善寺大廣智不空三藏奏。
translation: The special advanced examination of the monk Hongluo Qing of Daxingshansi Daguangzhi Bukong Tripiṭaka was held.

source_sentence: 玄宗肅宗今上三朝已來。
translation: Since the three dynasties of Emperor Xuanzong and Emperor Suizong, this one has been translated.

source_sentence: 所翻譯經論。
translation: The sūtras and treatises that have been translated.

source_sentence: 總七十七部。
translation: It's a total of 77 books.

source_sentence: 共一百四十一卷。
translation: There are a total of one hundred and forty-one volumes.

source_sentence: 并都目一卷。
translation: There's also an entire catalogue in one volume.

source_sentence: 具列如左。
translation: They are listed on the left.

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽真實大教王經三卷(經內題云金剛頂一切如來真實攝大乘現證大乘王經)　四十三紙金剛頂瑜伽般若理趣經一卷(經內題云大樂金剛不空真實三摩耶經般若波羅蜜多理趣品)　八紙觀自在菩薩授記經一卷(經內題云佛說大方廣曼殊室利經觀自在菩薩授記品第三十一)　十二紙瑜伽念殊經一卷(經內題云金剛頂瑜伽念珠經於十萬廣頌中略出)　二紙奇特佛頂經三卷(經內題云一字奇特佛頂經現威德品)　六十八紙觀自在菩薩最勝明王心經一卷(經內題云金剛恐怖集會方廣儀軌觀自在菩薩三世最勝心明王經序品第一)　二十二紙右六部共十一卷經。
translation: 金剛頂瑜伽真實大教王經三卷(經內題云金剛頂一切如來真實攝大乘現證大乘王經)　四十三紙金剛頂瑜伽般若理趣經一卷(經內題云大樂金剛不空真實三摩耶經般若波羅蜜多理趣品)　八紙觀自在菩薩授記經一卷(經內題云佛說大方廣曼殊室利經觀自在菩薩授記品第三十一)　十二紙瑜伽念殊經一卷(經內題云金剛頂瑜伽念珠經於十萬廣頌中略出)　二紙奇特佛頂經三卷(經內題云一字奇特佛頂經現威德品)　六十八紙觀自在菩薩最勝明王心經一卷(經內題云金剛恐怖集會方廣儀軌觀自在菩薩三世最勝心明王經序品第一)　二十二紙右六部共十一卷經。

source_sentence: 同第一帙。
translation: It's the same as the first book.

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽文殊師利菩薩經一卷(經內題云法一品亦名五字呪法)　十二紙阿唎多羅阿嚕力經一卷(經內題云阿唎多羅陀羅尼阿嚕力品第十四)　二十一紙普賢行願讚一卷　五紙地藏菩薩問法身讚一卷(經內題云百千頌大集經地藏菩薩請問法身讚)　五紙出生無邊門經一卷(經內題云出生無邊門陀羅尼經)　十紙大吉祥天女經一卷(經內題云佛說大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無垢大乘經)　七紙底哩三昧耶一卷(經內題云底哩三昧耶不動使者念誦品)　十四紙十一面觀自在菩薩經三卷(經內題云十一面觀自在菩薩心密言儀軌經)　二十四紙右八部經法共十卷同第二帙。
translation: 金剛頂瑜伽文殊師利菩薩經一卷(經內題云法一品亦名五字呪法)　十二紙阿唎多羅阿嚕力經一卷(經內題云阿唎多羅陀羅尼阿嚕力品第十四)　二十一紙普賢行願讚一卷　五紙地藏菩薩問法身讚一卷(經內題云百千頌大集經地藏菩薩請問法身讚)　五紙出生無邊門經一卷(經內題云出生無邊門陀羅尼經)　十紙大吉祥天女經一卷(經內題云佛說大吉祥天女十二契一百八名無垢大乘經)　七紙底哩三昧耶一卷(經內題云底哩三昧耶不動使者念誦品)　十四紙十一面觀自在菩薩經三卷(經內題云十一面觀自在菩薩心密言儀軌經)　二十四紙右八部經法共十卷同第二帙。

source_sentence: 吉祥天女十二名號經一卷　二紙
translation: Sutra on the Twelve Names of the Auspicious Goddess, 1 volume, 2 pages.

source_sentence: 金剛頂瑜伽十八會指歸一卷(經內略無十八會字)　九紙金剛頂瑜伽三十七尊分別聖位法門一卷(并序經中云修證法門序)　十三紙菩提場所說一字頂輪王經五卷　七十八紙寶篋經一卷(經內題云一切如來心祕密全身舍利寶篋印陀羅尼經)　六紙金剛壽命陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云一切如來金剛壽命陀羅尼經)　二紙右六部經共十卷同第三帙。
translation: Jingangding yoga yujiahui zhigui one-volume (the sūtra omits the word eighteenhui) nine-page Jingangding yoga thirty-seven honored ones discernment of the holy stages of the Dharma-gate one-volume (and the preface to the sūtra, which is the preface to the cultivation of the Dharma-gate) thirteen-page Bodhicaryasuo yiziding lunwang jing five-volume seventy-eight-page baoqie jing one-volume (the sūtra is titled Yiqie rulaixin mimi quanshen sheli baoqieyin tuoluoni jing) six-page Jingang life-span tuoluoni jing one-volume (the sūtra is titled Yiqie rulai jingang life-span tuoluoni jing) two-page right six-part jing a total of ten volumes in the same third book.

source_sentence: 大孔雀明王經三卷(經內題云佛母大孔雀明王經初有啟請法在上卷經前)　五十紙大雲輪請雨經二卷(經內題云大雲請雨經)　二十四紙雨寶陀羅尼經一卷(經內題中加佛說兩字)　五紙蘘麌利童女經一卷(經內題加佛說)　四紙稻[卄/幹]喻經一卷(經內題云慈氏菩薩所說大乘緣生稻[卄/幹]喻經)　八紙大寶廣博樓閣經三卷(經內題云大寶廣博樓閣善住祕密陀羅尼)　四十五紙右六部經共一十一卷同第四帙。
translation: 大孔雀明王經三卷(經內題云佛母大孔雀明王經初有啟請法在上卷經前)　五十紙大雲輪請雨經二卷(經內題云大雲請雨經)　二十四紙雨寶陀羅尼經一卷(經內題中加佛說兩字)　五紙蘘麌利童女經一卷(經內題加佛說)　四紙稻[卄/幹]喻經一卷(經內題云慈氏菩薩所說大乘緣生稻[卄/幹]喻經)　八紙大寶廣博樓閣經三卷(經內題云大寶廣博樓閣善住祕密陀羅尼)　四十五紙右六部經共一十一卷同第四帙。

source_sentence: 菩提場莊嚴經一卷(經內題云菩提場莊嚴陀羅尼經)　三十二紙除一切疾病陀羅尼經一卷　一紙能淨一切眼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云能淨一切眼疾病陀羅尼經)　二紙施焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云佛說救拔焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經)　四紙三十五佛名經一卷(經內題云佛說三十五佛名禮懺文出烏波離所問經)　二紙八大菩薩曼茶羅經一卷　三紙葉衣觀自在菩薩陀羅尼經一卷(經內略無陀羅尼字)　八紙訶利帝母經一卷(經內題云訶利帝母言法)　三紙毘沙門天王經一卷　四紙觀自在菩薩說普賢陀羅尼經一卷　七紙右十部共十卷同第五帙。
translation: 菩提場莊嚴經一卷(經內題云菩提場莊嚴陀羅尼經)　三十二紙除一切疾病陀羅尼經一卷　一紙能淨一切眼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云能淨一切眼疾病陀羅尼經)　二紙施焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云佛說救拔焰口餓鬼陀羅尼經)　四紙三十五佛名經一卷(經內題云佛說三十五佛名禮懺文出烏波離所問經)　二紙八大菩薩曼茶羅經一卷　三紙葉衣觀自在菩薩陀羅尼經一卷(經內略無陀羅尼字)　八紙訶利帝母經一卷(經內題云訶利帝母言法)　三紙毘沙門天王經一卷　四紙觀自在菩薩說普賢陀羅尼經一卷　七紙右十部共十卷同第五帙。

source_sentence: 文殊問字母品經一卷　三紙
translation: Wenshu wenqi xinpin jing one volume Three pages

source_sentence: 金剛頂蓮花部心念誦法一卷(經內云念誦儀軌)　二十三紙金剛頂瑜伽千手千眼觀自在念誦法一卷(或二卷經內題菩薩修行儀軌)　二十八紙無量壽如來念誦儀軌一卷(經內云修觀行供養儀軌)　十二紙阿閦如來念誦法一卷(經內云念誦供養法)　十紙佛頂尊勝念誦法一卷(經內云佛頂尊勝陀羅尼念誦儀軌)　八紙金剛頂勝初瑜伽普賢菩薩念誦法一卷　十三紙金剛王菩薩念誦法一卷(經內云祕密念誦儀軌)　十二紙普賢金剛薩埵念誦法一卷(經內云瑜伽念誦儀軌)　十二紙金剛頂瑜伽五祕密修行儀軌一卷(經內云金剛薩埵五祕密修行念誦儀軌)　十二紙右十部儀法共十卷同第六帙。
translation: 金剛頂蓮花部心念誦法一卷(經內云念誦儀軌)　二十三紙金剛頂瑜伽千手千眼觀自在念誦法一卷(或二卷經內題菩薩修行儀軌)　二十八紙無量壽如來念誦儀軌一卷(經內云修觀行供養儀軌)　十二紙阿閦如來念誦法一卷(經內云念誦供養法)　十紙佛頂尊勝念誦法一卷(經內云佛頂尊勝陀羅尼念誦儀軌)　八紙金剛頂勝初瑜伽普賢菩薩念誦法一卷　十三紙金剛王菩薩念誦法一卷(經內云祕密念誦儀軌)　十二紙普賢金剛薩埵念誦法一卷(經內云瑜伽念誦儀軌)　十二紙金剛頂瑜伽五祕密修行儀軌一卷(經內云金剛薩埵五祕密修行念誦儀軌)　十二紙右十部儀法共十卷同第六帙。

source_sentence: 金剛壽命念誦法一卷(經內云陀羅尼念誦法)　三紙一字頂輪王瑜伽經一卷(經內云瑜伽翳迦訖沙羅烏瑟尼沙斫訖囉真言安怛陀那儀則一字頂輪王瑜伽經)　六紙一字佛頂輪王念誦儀軌一卷(經內題中無佛字)　十二紙仁王般若念誦法一卷　十五紙如意輪念誦法一卷(經內云觀自在如意輪菩薩念誦法)　八紙大虛空藏菩薩念誦法一卷　五紙瑜伽蓮華部念誦法一卷　七紙聖觀自在菩薩心真言觀行儀軌一卷(經內云瑜伽觀行儀軌)　六紙觀自在多羅瑜伽念誦法一卷(經內云金剛頂經多羅菩薩念誦法)　十三紙甘露軍吒利瑜伽念誦法一卷(經內題云甘露軍吒利菩薩供養念誦成就儀軌)　十八紙右十部經法共十卷同第七帙。
translation: 金剛壽命念誦法一卷(經內云陀羅尼念誦法)　三紙一字頂輪王瑜伽經一卷(經內云瑜伽翳迦訖沙羅烏瑟尼沙斫訖囉真言安怛陀那儀則一字頂輪王瑜伽經)　六紙一字佛頂輪王念誦儀軌一卷(經內題中無佛字)　十二紙仁王般若念誦法一卷　十五紙如意輪念誦法一卷(經內云觀自在如意輪菩薩念誦法)　八紙大虛空藏菩薩念誦法一卷　五紙瑜伽蓮華部念誦法一卷　七紙聖觀自在菩薩心真言觀行儀軌一卷(經內云瑜伽觀行儀軌)　六紙觀自在多羅瑜伽念誦法一卷(經內云金剛頂經多羅菩薩念誦法)　十三紙甘露軍吒利瑜伽念誦法一卷(經內題云甘露軍吒利菩薩供養念誦成就儀軌)　十八紙右十部經法共十卷同第七帙。

source_sentence: 花嚴入法界品四十二字觀門一卷(經內題云大方廣佛花嚴經)　六紙文殊讚法身禮一卷(經內題云大聖文殊師利菩薩讚佛法身禮并序)　三紙受菩提心戒儀一卷(經內題云最上乘教受戒懺悔文普賢瑜伽阿闍梨集)　三紙金剛頂瑜伽三十七尊禮一卷(經內題云金剛頂經金剛界大道場毘盧遮那如來身受用身內證智眷屬法身異名佛最上乘三摩地禮懺文)　四紙般若理趣經釋二卷(經內題云大樂金剛不空真實三昧耶經般若波羅蜜多理趣釋)　三十二紙大曼荼羅十七尊釋一卷(經內題云般若波羅蜜多理趣經大安樂不空三昧耶真實金剛菩薩等一十七大曼荼羅義述)　三紙金剛頂瑜伽護摩儀一卷(經內云儀軌)　八紙都部陀羅尼目一卷(經內題云陀羅尼門諸部要目)　四紙大乘緣生論一卷(論內題云聖者鬱楞起造)　十紙七俱胝佛母陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云七俱胝佛母所說准提陀羅尼經)　十九紙右十部經論法共十一卷。
translation: 花嚴入法界品四十二字觀門一卷(經內題云大方廣佛花嚴經)　六紙文殊讚法身禮一卷(經內題云大聖文殊師利菩薩讚佛法身禮并序)　三紙受菩提心戒儀一卷(經內題云最上乘教受戒懺悔文普賢瑜伽阿闍梨集)　三紙金剛頂瑜伽三十七尊禮一卷(經內題云金剛頂經金剛界大道場毘盧遮那如來身受用身內證智眷屬法身異名佛最上乘三摩地禮懺文)　四紙般若理趣經釋二卷(經內題云大樂金剛不空真實三昧耶經般若波羅蜜多理趣釋)　三十二紙大曼荼羅十七尊釋一卷(經內題云般若波羅蜜多理趣經大安樂不空三昧耶真實金剛菩薩等一十七大曼荼羅義述)　三紙金剛頂瑜伽護摩儀一卷(經內云儀軌)　八紙都部陀羅尼目一卷(經內題云陀羅尼門諸部要目)　四紙大乘緣生論一卷(論內題云聖者鬱楞起造)　十紙七俱胝佛母陀羅尼經一卷(經內題云七俱胝佛母所說准提陀羅尼經)　十九紙右十部經論法共十一卷。

source_sentence: 同第八帙。
translation: It's the same as the eighth book.

source_sentence: 大虛空藏菩薩所問經八卷(或云大集)　一百七紙右一部經共八卷同第九帙。
translation: Da xukongzang pusa suowen jing eight rolls (or Da ji) One hundred and seven papers right One sūtra in eight rolls Same as the ninth book.

source_sentence: 仁王經二卷(經內題云仁王護國般若波羅蜜多經并御製序)　三十五紙密嚴經三卷(經內題云大乘密嚴經并御製序)　五十一紙仁王念誦儀軌一卷(經內題云仁王護國般若波羅蜜多經陀羅尼念誦儀軌)　十九紙右已上經等。
translation: Renwang jing 2 rolls (the title of the sūtra is Renwang huguo banruo boluomi tuo jing and the preface to the imperial order) 35-page Miyan jing 3 rolls (the title of the sūtra is Dasheng miyan jing and the preface to the imperial order) 51-page Renwang niansong yigui 1 roll (the title of the sūtra is Renwang huguo banruo boluomi tuoluoni niansong yigui) 19-page right-hand sūtra and so forth.

source_sentence: 並出大曆七年正月十六日。
translation: It also appeared on the 16th day of the first month of the seventh year of the Dali era.

source_sentence: 代宗勅下流行目中宜編入一切經目錄(准元奏狀一百一卷勅下欠二卷具定得九十八卷於中三卷是仁王疏今移在下疏目中見定得九十七卷)次後續譯進上具件如後。
translation: The Daizong Imaizhao popular catalog of scriptures should be compiled into the catalog of all the scriptures (according to the Yuanzhao certificate one hundred and one rolls Imaizhao owes two rolls with ninety-eight rolls in which three rolls are Renwang's commentary now moved in the lower commentary catalog with ninety-seven rolls in view) and the next subsequent translation advances on the documents as later.

source_sentence: 大聖文殊師利菩薩佛剎功德莊嚴經三卷　五十一紙成就妙法蓮華經王瑜伽觀智儀軌一卷　二十五紙右通前仁王等經總五部共十卷同第十帙。
translation: The three volumes of the Mahāyāna Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva's Sutra of the Merit of the Buddha's Temple are fifty-one pages in length, and the one volume of the Sutra of the Lotus of the Wonderful Dharma King's Manual of Contemplative Wisdom is twenty-five pages in length.

source_sentence: 金剛頂勝初瑜伽經中略出大樂金剛薩埵念誦儀一卷　十一紙大樂金剛薩埵修行成就儀軌一卷(出吉祥勝初教王瑜伽經)　十五紙大藥叉女歡喜母并愛子成就法一卷(亦名訶哩底母法)　十二紙普遍光明大隨求陀羅尼經二卷(經內題云普遍光明清淨熾盛如意寶印心無能勝大明王隨求陀羅尼經)　三十二紙金剛頂超勝三界說文殊五字真言勝相一卷　三紙五字陀羅尼頌一卷(并梵字)　八紙聖閻曼德迦威怒王立成大神驗念誦法一卷　十八紙文殊師利菩薩根本大教王金翅鳥王品一卷　十一紙不空羂索毘盧遮那佛大灌頂光真言一卷(出不空羂索經二十八)　二紙右九部經法共十卷同第十一帙。
translation: 金剛頂勝初瑜伽經中略出大樂金剛薩埵念誦儀一卷　十一紙大樂金剛薩埵修行成就儀軌一卷(出吉祥勝初教王瑜伽經)　十五紙大藥叉女歡喜母并愛子成就法一卷(亦名訶哩底母法)　十二紙普遍光明大隨求陀羅尼經二卷(經內題云普遍光明清淨熾盛如意寶印心無能勝大明王隨求陀羅尼經)　三十二紙金剛頂超勝三界說文殊五字真言勝相一卷　三紙五字陀羅尼頌一卷(并梵字)　八紙聖閻曼德迦威怒王立成大神驗念誦法一卷　十八紙文殊師利菩薩根本大教王金翅鳥王品一卷　十一紙不空羂索毘盧遮那佛大灌頂光真言一卷(出不空羂索經二十八)　二紙右九部經法共十卷同第十一帙。

source_sentence: 聖迦抳忿怒金剛童子菩薩成就儀軌經一卷　四十八紙大威怒烏蒭澁摩儀軌一卷　十紙佛說摩利支天經一卷　四紙金剛頂經一字頂輪王瑜伽一切時處念誦成佛儀軌一卷　八紙佛為優填王說王法政論經一卷　九紙大方廣如來藏經一卷　十八紙佛說一髻尊陀羅尼經一卷　十四紙速疾立驗摩醯首羅天說迦婁羅阿尾奢法一卷　六紙右八部經法共十卷同第十二帙。
translation: 聖迦抳忿怒金剛童子菩薩成就儀軌經一卷　四十八紙大威怒烏蒭澁摩儀軌一卷　十紙佛說摩利支天經一卷　四紙金剛頂經一字頂輪王瑜伽一切時處念誦成佛儀軌一卷　八紙佛為優填王說王法政論經一卷　九紙大方廣如來藏經一卷　十八紙佛說一髻尊陀羅尼經一卷　十四紙速疾立驗摩醯首羅天說迦婁羅阿尾奢法一卷　六紙右八部經法共十卷同第十二帙。

source_sentence: 大日經略攝念誦隨行法一卷(亦名五支略念誦要行法)　二紙大毘盧遮那成佛神變加持經略示七支念誦隨行法一卷　三紙木槵經一卷　一紙金剛頂瑜伽文殊師利菩薩儀軌供養法一品(亦名文殊五字念誦法并梵字)　二十四紙曼殊室唎童子菩薩五字瑜伽法一卷(并梵字)　二紙金剛頂降三世大儀軌一卷(經內題云金剛頂降三世大儀軌法王教中觀自在菩薩心真言一切如來蓮花大曼荼羅)　四紙文殊師利菩薩及諸仙所說吉凶時日善惡宿曜經二卷　四十紙金剛頂經觀自在王如來修行法一卷　六紙金剛頂瑜伽中發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心論一卷(亦云瑜伽總持教門說菩提心觀行修持義)　七紙右九部經論法共十卷同第十三帙。
translation: 大日經略攝念誦隨行法一卷(亦名五支略念誦要行法)　二紙大毘盧遮那成佛神變加持經略示七支念誦隨行法一卷　三紙木槵經一卷　一紙金剛頂瑜伽文殊師利菩薩儀軌供養法一品(亦名文殊五字念誦法并梵字)　二十四紙曼殊室唎童子菩薩五字瑜伽法一卷(并梵字)　二紙金剛頂降三世大儀軌一卷(經內題云金剛頂降三世大儀軌法王教中觀自在菩薩心真言一切如來蓮花大曼荼羅)　四紙文殊師利菩薩及諸仙所說吉凶時日善惡宿曜經二卷　四十紙金剛頂經觀自在王如來修行法一卷　六紙金剛頂瑜伽中發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心論一卷(亦云瑜伽總持教門說菩提心觀行修持義)　七紙右九部經論法共十卷同第十三帙。

source_sentence: 瑜伽金剛頂經釋字母品一卷　二紙
translation: Alphabet Chapter of the Explanation of the Vajraśekhara Sutra (1 volume, 2 pages)

source_sentence: 修習般若波羅蜜菩薩觀行念誦儀軌一卷　七紙仁王般若陀羅尼釋一卷　七紙觀自在大悲成就瑜伽蓮華部念誦法門一卷(亦名成就大悲觀自在)　十二紙佛說大孔雀明王畫像壇場儀軌一卷　四紙餘金剛手光明灌頂經(最勝立印聖無動尊大威怒王念誦儀軌法品一卷)　十一紙末利支提婆花鬘經一卷　十一紙大聖天歡喜雙身毘那夜迦法一卷　三紙觀自在菩薩如意輪瑜伽一卷　九紙金輪王佛頂略念誦法一卷　三紙金剛瑜伽降三世成就極深密門一卷　三紙右十一部經法共十一卷同第十四帙。
translation: 修習般若波羅蜜菩薩觀行念誦儀軌一卷　七紙仁王般若陀羅尼釋一卷　七紙觀自在大悲成就瑜伽蓮華部念誦法門一卷(亦名成就大悲觀自在)　十二紙佛說大孔雀明王畫像壇場儀軌一卷　四紙餘金剛手光明灌頂經(最勝立印聖無動尊大威怒王念誦儀軌法品一卷)　十一紙末利支提婆花鬘經一卷　十一紙大聖天歡喜雙身毘那夜迦法一卷　三紙觀自在菩薩如意輪瑜伽一卷　九紙金輪王佛頂略念誦法一卷　三紙金剛瑜伽降三世成就極深密門一卷　三紙右十一部經法共十一卷同第十四帙。

source_sentence: 今朝所翻經　聖神文武皇帝貞元四年歲次戊辰勅罽賓國三藏沙門般若與沙門利言等譯。
translation: This is the translation of the sutra that was undertaken by the emperor Shōshin Wenwu in the fourth year of his reign, during the eighth year of his reign, which was translated by Imaan Banruo, the tripiṭaka monk in Kāśmīra, and Layan, the monk.

source_sentence: 大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經十卷　一百六十紙大花嚴長者問佛那羅延力經一卷　二紙般若波羅蜜多心經一卷　二紙右件三部十二卷同第十五帙。
translation: Dasheng liqiu li poluomi tu jing 10 rolls 160 pages Da huayan zhangzhe wenfo narayan li jing 1 roll 2 pages Prajñāpāramitā xin jing 1 roll 2 pages Right three parts 12 rolls same as the fifteenth book.

source_sentence: 守護國界主陀羅尼經十卷(般若共牟尼室利譯)　一百五十五紙右一部十卷同第十六帙(貞元六年)。
translation: Shouhuo guojiezhu tuoluoni jing shizhao ten rolls (Prajñā co-mouni shili yi) One hundred and fifty-five pages, right, one part, ten rolls, same as the sixteenth book (Zhenyan 6).

source_sentence: 本生心地觀經一部八卷(并三藏般若譯)右一部八卷同第十七帙(貞元六年)。
translation: One Eight-fascicle Sutra of Contemplation on the Mind Ground in the Buddha's Life (also translated by the Tripiṭaka Prajñāpāramitā): right one eight-fascicle work in the same series as the seventeenth book (6th year of the Zōgen period).

source_sentence: 十力經一卷　安西三藏勿提提犀魚譯(於安西譯)　三紙迴向輪經一卷　四紙十地經九卷　一百二十一紙　于闐三藏尸羅達磨於北庭譯右三經十一卷同第十八帙。
translation: Shili jing (Ten Powers sūtra) 1 volume (translated at Anxi by the Tripiṭaka of Anxi, Betsy Tixingyu) 3-page dedication of merit sūtra 1 volume (translated at Anxi) 4-page ten stages sūtra 9 volumes (121 pages) (translated at Beiting by the Tripiṭaka of Khotan, Śīladharma) 11 volumes of the right three sūtras in the same book as the eighteenth.

source_sentence: 千臂千鉢曼殊室利經十卷　大唐贈開府儀同三司諡大弘教三藏金剛智於長安薦福寺譯右一部十卷同第十九帙。
translation: Thousand Arms, Thousand Bowls, and Ten Volumes: A Translation of the Sutra of Mañjuśrī, Presented by the Great Tang Dynasty to the Third Secretary of the Kaifu Ritual, and Translated by the Great Hongjiao Tripiṭaka, Jingangzhi, at Zhanfusi Temple, Chang'an, Right, in Ten Volumes, Same as the Nineteenth Book.

source_sentence: 共一百二十二部。
translation: There are one hundred and twenty-two books in all.

source_sentence: 二百一卷。
translation: Two hundred and one volumes.

source_sentence: 計二十帙。
translation: It's counted as twenty books.

source_sentence: 六十四卷經律疏義
translation: Commentary on the Sutra and Vinaya in Sixty-four Fascicles

source_sentence: 代宗朝新再譯。
translation: A New Re-translation of the Sutra of the Daizong Dynasty.

source_sentence: 仁王護國般若波羅蜜多經疏三卷
translation: Renwang huguo banruo boluomi tuoshu three rolls

source_sentence: 右翻經大德青龍寺沙門良賁奉勅撰。
translation: Right Translation of the Sutra Dade Qinglongsi shaman Liangben was commissioned to write this.

source_sentence: 大集大虛空藏菩薩所問經疏四卷
translation: Daji daxukongzang pusa suowen jing shou four rolls

source_sentence: 大聖文殊師利菩薩佛剎功德莊嚴經疏三卷發菩提心義一卷　六紙發菩提心戒一卷(并三聚淨戒及十善法戒)　共十三紙右四部共九卷。
translation: *Tridharmaka Mañjuśrī Bodhisattva's Commentary on the Sutra of Merit of the Buddha's Temple, three volumes, one volume, six pages, and one volume of the precepts for the arousal of the aspiration for enlightenment (and the three groups of pure precepts and the ten good precepts), thirteen pages in total, and nine volumes in four parts.

source_sentence: 並翻經講論大德大興善寺沙門潛真奉勅撰。
translation: It's also a translation of the sūtras and lectures, which was written by Ima-mai, the ascetic Qianzhen of Daxingshan Temple.

source_sentence: 右通仁王經疏共一十二卷　同第一帙。
translation: The Right Hand Handbook of the Sutra of King Ren is composed of twelve volumes, which are the same as the first book.

source_sentence: 僉定四分律疏十卷
translation: Congding shifenlü shou 10 rolls

source_sentence: 右京城臨壇大德如淨惠徹等一十四人。
translation: Right, fourteen people from the capital, including the provisional deities Rujing Huiche.

source_sentence: 奉代宗大曆十三年十一月二十七日勅。
translation: They were commanded to do so by the 27th day of the 11th month of the 13th year of the Daizong era.

source_sentence: 於大安國寺戒律院僉定。
translation: They were selected at the precepts and vinaya hall of Dajianguo Temple.

source_sentence: 至今上建中二年二月十三日修撰訖進上。
translation: Up to now, it was revised on the 13th day of the second month in the second year of the establishment of the king's administration, and then it was presented to the king's council.

source_sentence: 制下流行。
translation: It is published below.

source_sentence: 右律疏一部十卷。
translation: The Right Hand Commentary on the Vinaya is a ten-volume work.

source_sentence: 第二帙。
translation: The second book.

source_sentence: 大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經疏十卷
translation: Dasheng liqiu liuboluomi tuoshu 10 scrolls.

source_sentence: 右翻經大德西明寺沙門良秀等奉勅撰。
translation: Right Translation of the Sutra Daide Ximingsi shaman Liangxiu and others were commissioned to write this.

source_sentence: 右經疏一部十卷第三帙。
translation: The right sūtra commentary is a ten-volume work in the third book.

source_sentence: 又大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經疏十卷
translation: Also, the ten-fascicle commentary on the Dasheng liqiu liuboluomi tu jing

source_sentence: 右翻經大德醴泉寺沙門超悟等奉勅撰。
translation: Right Translation of the Sutra Dade Lizhuansi shaman Chaowu and others were instructed to compose this work.

source_sentence: 右經疏一部十卷同第四帙。
translation: The right sūtra commentary is one ten-fascicle work, which is the same as the fourth book.

source_sentence: 又大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經疏十卷(各分上下成二十卷)大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經疏例訣一卷大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經疏義目一卷右翻經大德光宅寺沙門道岸。
translation: It's also a ten-volume commentary on the Dasheng liqiu liubolomituo jing (each divided into twenty volumes), a one-volume commentary on the Dasheng liqiu liubolomituo jing, and a one-volume commentary on the Dasheng liqiu liubolomituo jing, and a one-volume commentary on the Dasheng liqiu liubolomituo jing, Right Translation sūtra, written by Daotze Daizhang, an ascetic at Guangzhaisi.

source_sentence: 章敬寺大德沙門智通等奉勅撰。
translation: It was written by the great virtuous ascetic Zhitong of Zhangjing Temple.

source_sentence: 右經疏一部均成二十卷。
translation: The right sūtra commentary is composed of one text, all in twenty volumes.

source_sentence: 并例訣義目共二十二卷。
translation: Together with the commentary on the example, it contains a total of twenty-two volumes.

source_sentence: 分為第五第六帙。
translation: It's divided into the fifth and sixth books.

source_sentence: 八十八卷貞元新集古今制令碑表記錄高宗置京師西明寺制令集二卷(寺碑附出)右沙門圓照謹依元勅令本集出。
translation: The eighty-eight volume Zhenyuan xinji gujin jingling bei table records the two volumes of the Jing-shi Ximing si jingling jiji jingling ji (temple tablet attached to the output).

source_sentence: 京師西明寺錄三卷
translation: Jingshi Ximingsi lu (Record of the Jingsi Ximing Temple) 3 volumes

source_sentence: 釋氏道宣感通記一卷
translation: Shi Shi Daoxuan gantong ji 1 roll

source_sentence: 開中創立戒壇圖經一卷
translation: One Fascicle of the Charted Sutra on the Establishment of the Precepts in the Middle

source_sentence: 右終南山故大德西明寺上座釋氏道宣律師修述。
translation: Right, this is a commentary by the lawyer Shishi Daoxuan, the former head of the Daide Ximing Temple on Mt. Zhongnan.

source_sentence: 共三部五卷。
translation: It consists of three parts and five volumes.

source_sentence: 未入一切經藏。
translation: It's not yet included in all the sūtra collections.

source_sentence: 今請編入目錄。
translation: I hereby request that you compile it into the catalogue.

source_sentence: 睿宗玄宗釋氏系錄一卷
translation: Rui zong xuanzong shishi lineage record one volume

source_sentence: 右諡大慧禪師沙門一行。
translation: The right-hand side of the Chan Master Dahui, the ascetic lineage.

source_sentence: 開元年奉勅修撰已編入史。
translation: He was commissioned to compile this document in the Kaiyuan year, and it has been compiled into the annals of the monastery.

source_sentence: 總有四條。
translation: There are four general entries.

source_sentence: 一網維塔寺。
translation: I. The Netweed Pagoda Temple.

source_sentence: 二說法旨歸。
translation: 2. He explained the purpose of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 三坐禪修證。
translation: 3. He sits in meditation and cultivates its realization.

source_sentence: 四三法服衣。
translation: Four, the three ways to dress in robes.

source_sentence: 於中齋法附。
translation: These are attached to the rules for purification in the interim.

source_sentence: 故金剛智三藏行記一卷
translation: Therefore, the Jingangzhi sanzang xingji is in one volume.

source_sentence: 右灌頂弟子正議大夫行中書舍人侍皇太子諸王文章集賢院學士呂向紀。
translation: Record of the Consecration of the Right Disciple, the Directly Advised Grand Master, the Consul of the Office of the Secretary of State, the Royal Prince, the Assessor of the Kings, and the Bachelor of the House of Jihyeon, Lu Xiang.

source_sentence: 東京大廣福寺故金剛三藏塔銘一卷(并序)右混倫翁撰并書。
translation: A one-volume inscription on the late Jingang Sanzang's stūpa at Dagongfusi in Tokyo (with a preface) written and copied by Menglun Weng.

source_sentence: 已上七部十卷。
translation: There are seven parts and ten volumes above.

source_sentence: 同為第一帙。
translation: They are all in the same first volume.

source_sentence: 大唐安國大法師釋利涉紀傳十卷
translation: Da tang anguo dashi shi li shou ji biography ten volumes

source_sentence: 右左監門衛率府錄事參軍趙充勛字撰修述。
translation: Zhao Chongxun, a military attaché of the Office of the Chief of Staff of the Right Supervisor of the Gate, wrote and revised the text.

source_sentence: 右為一部同第二帙。
translation: The right one is the same as the second book.

source_sentence: 先天開元天寶誥制集三卷(碑表狀附見)右沙門圓照謹依年代次而述之。
translation: The collection of three volumes of the Letters of Administration of the First Emperor Kaiyuan and Tianbao (the tablet form is attached) is described by the right ascetic Yuanzhao in chronological order.

source_sentence: 肅宗制旨碑表集一卷
translation: Su Zong mingji bishou shouji shouji 1 volume

source_sentence: 代宗制旨碑表集一卷
translation: Daizong zhiyi shibiao shizhu (Collected Documents)

source_sentence: 贈司空諡大辯正大廣智不空三藏碑表集七卷右四部共十二卷同為第三帙。
translation: The collection of seven volumes of the monument table of the Bukong Tripiṭaka of the Siṃkū Śākyamuni, a total of twelve volumes on the right, is the third book in the same series.

source_sentence: 大唐再修隋故傳法高僧信行禪師塔碑表集五卷翻經臨壇大德西明安國兩寺上座乘如表狀集三卷今上修撰僉定四分律疏制旨集一卷般若三藏續古今翻譯經圖紀二卷右四部共十一卷同為第四帙。
translation: The Great Tang Re-Xiuxiu Sui deixue chanshi xinxing chanshi pagoda bie table collection of five volumes, the sūtra translation lintan dade ximing anguo two temples shōzai xianru table shape collection of three volumes, the present superior xiuxu shoucheng sifen lu shou system gi collection of one volume, the prajñā tripiṭaka continuity ancient and modern translation sūtra diagram collection of two volumes, the right four parts totaling eleven volumes, and the same fourth volume.

source_sentence: 大乘理趣六波羅蜜多經音義二卷
translation: The Pronunciations and Meanings of the Six Perfections of the Mahāyāna Path Two Fascicle

source_sentence: 三教法王存歿年代本記三卷(上卷佛中卷道下卷儒分三)翻經大德翰林待詔光宅寺沙門利言集二卷翻經大德西明寺上座賜紫沙門良秀集二卷右四部共十一卷同為第五帙。
translation: Sanjiao fawang cun yiji benji 3 volumes (上卷佛中卷道下卷儒分三) 再經大德翰林待詔光宅寺沙門利言集二卷翻經大德西明寺上座賜紫沙門良秀集二卷右四部共11卷同同为第五篇。

source_sentence: 僧寶道唄讚六十首一卷(超濟院讚附見)右朝散大夫守太子詹事賜紫金魚袋致仕魯國都昴字高卿撰。
translation: Saṃbō dōjō zan 60 shōshi 1 roll (Chaojiyuan zan with a commentary) Right: Chaosan dafu shoutaizi zhiji gaoqing zhibing zijin fishbag zishi ruguo tuizi.

source_sentence: 再修釋迦牟尼佛法王本記一卷
translation: Revision of the Record of the Dharma King of the Śākyamuni Buddha in One Volume

source_sentence: 大聖釋迦牟尼佛現八相身利益天人成正覺記一卷判方等道場欲受近圓沙彌懺悔滅罪辯瑞相記一卷釋氏五部律翻譯年代傳授人記一卷新修大莊嚴寺本師釋迦牟尼佛牙寶塔記三卷聖朝無憂王寺大聖釋迦牟尼佛真身舍利塔記三卷右七部共十一卷同為第六帙。
translation: Record of the Great Sage Śākyamuni's Eight-figure Body that Benefits Gods and People and Becomes Perfectly Enlightened One Fascicle: Record of the Nearly Perfect Śākyamuni's Repentance, Extinguishing Crimes, and Defining Rituals One Fascicle: Record of the Five Translators, Translators, and Transferees of the Śākyamuni's Five Vinaya One Fascicle: Record of the Original Śākyamuni's Teeth, Three Fascicles: Record of the Great Sage Śākyamuni's True Body Relic Pagoda at Wuzuwang Temple, Shengzhao Dynasty, Three Fascicles: The Right Seven Parts, Eleven Fascicles in Total, Sixth Fascicle.

source_sentence: 唐朝傳法三學大德沙門碑記集十五卷建中興元貞元制旨釋門并表集二卷御題章敬寺太子百寮奉和詩集三卷大唐貞元續開元釋教錄三卷(上卷翻經中卷疏記下卷入藏)右四部共二十三卷。
translation: The Tang Dynasty Dharma Transmission Triology Daide shaman stele record collection fifteen rolls Jianzhong Xingyuan Zhenyuan system will be interpreted as a collection of monks and tables two rolls Otōtō zhōgyeongji taiji bairou fonghe poetry collection three rolls Datang Zhenyuan continuity Kaiyuan shijiao lu three rolls (the upper rolls turn the scriptures middle rolls shouji the lower rolls involve the store) right four parts totaling twenty-three rolls.

source_sentence: 分成第七帙第八帙。
translation: It's divided into the seventh and eighth books.

source_sentence: 新譯大方廣佛花嚴經四十卷　罽賓國沙門般若奉詔譯右一部四十卷四帙　六百一十二紙。
translation: Forty Fascicles of the New Translation of the Flower Ornament Sutra (Śākyamuni, Kāśmīra, and Prajñāpāramitā) The right one was translated by imperial order into forty fascicles and four books of six hundred and twelve pages.

source_sentence: 貞元十二年譯。
translation: It was translated in the twelfth year of the reign of King Zhenyuan.

source_sentence: 十四年上。
translation: It was translated in the 14th year and up.

source_sentence: 不在此收　通前般若三藏所譯。
translation: It was not collected here. It was translated by the Prajñā Tripiṭaka of Tongxian.

source_sentence: 共七十卷。
translation: It's a total of seventy volumes.

source_sentence: 都收貞元藏大錄　通前二十三帙。
translation: It's all included in the Zhenyan Canon's Great Record, which contains the first twenty-three books.

source_sentence: 右沙門圓照啟。
translation: Right, the ascetic Yuanzhao Kai.

source_sentence: 去年四月皇帝降誕日面奉令旨許修撰上件釋教錄。
translation: On the emperor's birthday day in April of last year, I was instructed to cultivate the above translation of the Shākyamuni Canon.

source_sentence: 比為繕寫。
translation: It's better to copy and write it.

source_sentence: 挍勘未周。
translation: It was not thoroughly checked.

source_sentence: 不獲啟上。
translation: It was not revealed to the emperor.

source_sentence: 伏以。
translation: Please take this as a reason.

source_sentence: 開元十八年歲在庚午西。
translation: In the 18th year of the Kaiyuan era, the year was in the west of the Gengwu period.

source_sentence: 崇福寺沙門智昇修開元釋教錄二十卷。
translation: The ascetic Zhisheng of Chongfusi cultivated 20 volumes of the Kaiyuan Translation of the Shākyamuni Canon.

source_sentence: 洎去年甲戌。
translation: It was in Kixu last year.

source_sentence: 又經六十五年。
translation: It's been another sixty-five years.

source_sentence: 中間三藏翻經藏內無憑收管。
translation: In the interim, the Tripiṭaka translated the scriptures and stored them without a certificate.

source_sentence: 恐年代浸遠人疑偽經。
translation: It was feared that people might suspect it was a forgery because it was so old.

source_sentence: 先聖大曆七年許編入錄。
translation: The previous sage compiled the records in the seventh year of the Dali era.

source_sentence: 制文具如上卷令宣示中外流行。
translation: He prepared stationery like the above volume and ordered it to be proclaimed as popular in China and abroad.

source_sentence: 又修經律疏義已制流傳。
translation: Also, the sūtras, vinaya, and commentaries have been compiled and transmitted.

source_sentence: 又貞元新集者。
translation: It was also Zhenyuan's new collection.

source_sentence: 共有八十六卷。
translation: There are eighty-six volumes in all.

source_sentence: 或先皇制旨。
translation: Some of them were prepared by the previous emperor's order.

source_sentence: 或今上湛恩留獎勸。
translation: Some of them were made by the former emperor, while others were made by the present emperor, Zhan Enliu, to encourage and reward.

source_sentence: 釋勵已書之錄成三卷。
translation: It's been written and recorded in three fascicles.

source_sentence: 并問佛那羅延力經等三經十二卷。
translation: It also includes three sūtras, including the Sutra of the Questions of the Buddha's Power of Nārāyaṇa, and twelve other sūtras.

source_sentence: 伏冀。
translation: I hope.

source_sentence: 上資聖祚寶曆遐長。
translation: "May the emperor bestow a long and noble fortune, a long and treasured calendar, and a long life.

source_sentence: 殿下諸王福延萬業。
translation: Your Highness, the kings' fortune will prolong myriad undertakings.

source_sentence: 文武百辟盡孝盡忠。
translation: Wen and Wu and the hundred wise men will fulfill their filial piety and loyalty.

source_sentence: 三寶永興遠安邇肅。
translation: The three treasures will continue to flourish far and wide, and the region will be made secure.

source_sentence: 如或上聞聖慈允許。
translation: If the emperor hears of the permission of the noble compassion, I beg him to proclaim that it's prevalent throughout the world.

source_sentence: 伏乞宣布天下流行。
translation: I beg you to proclaim it to be popular throughout the world.

source_sentence: 輕冒威嚴伏希詳覽。
translation: I beg you to take the liberty of discussing it in detail with your authority.

source_sentence: 謹奉啟　貞元十一年四月二十四日。
translation: I beg to be instructed on the 24th day of the 4th month in the 11th year of Zhenyuan.

source_sentence: 翻經臨壇西明寺沙門圓照啟上。
translation: This translation of the sūtra was revealed to the monk Yuanzhao of Ximing Temple in Lintan.

source_sentence: 大唐貞元續開元釋教錄卷下
translation: Great Tang Zhenyuan Continued Kaiyuan Translation of the Teaching Record, Volume 2
